comment: Please change to the new logo

reply.content:
Hello there, 
thank you for the feedback but we are having hard time understanding your issue report. 
Which logo are you referring to? Please let us know via email (ask.watchmaster@gmail.com) and we will be happy to look into the problem for you. 
Thank you and best regards.
